36561877.review: Dig 4 Destruction has an incredibly small playerbase and that's a total bummer. Fortunately, there are bots to alleviate it. It's possibly my favorite VR game thus far. The movement system is the few that can properly incorporate locomotion as a gameplay element and it just feels right. D4D manages to maintain a level of suspense as you dig every tunnel, no matter how late game you are and how many tunnels are dug. If you've got VR buddies to play with, I would even recommend it at full price. I'd say it's even worth a purchase if you're playing with bots at a sale price (bought mine for $8.39 and am happy with it)

29734472.review:
Engage in free-floating first person multiplayer combat in minecraft-style environments in Dig 4 Destruction, a room scale VR game for the HTC Vive (and possibly also the oculus touch). In each level, you fly around digging your way through walls to get to items, weapons, or just to get a better vantage point on your opponents. The sonar feature allows for all players to quickly and easily find each other making combat really fast and crazy.

The only downside to this game is twofold: It’s a VR game, which means the community for it is very small AND the developers unfortunately made it so that you can do 4 player matches OR bot matches but not 2 players and 2 bots or any variation thereof. So try and get some friends to pick up this title at the same time as you if you want to get the full multiplayer experience. That being said, his game has a surprising amount of spit and polish for a VR title and is actually quite fun to play, even with bots.

这是一款有趣的需要带着动物面具和朋友互射的联机VR游戏。
特点：游戏每天会给每一位玩家发不同动物面具，有的萌蠢有的二哈，而你的武器或者其他装备，都可以在游戏世界中探索发现，不仅仅有手枪、还有手雷、火箭炮等群体伤害武器，游戏中还有一个神器：黑锅可以用来抵挡攻击。而在游戏之余，你可以和朋友一起在休息室玩投篮，拍照片合影~在游戏结束时，还可以一起放烟花庆祝一下。总体来说，游戏非常的欢乐，不血腥不恐怖，有点像趣味马赛克风格的CF。
遗憾：目前来说可选地图还是比较少，而且因为玩的人少，经常排队半天没人一起玩，只好选择打电脑……

26706744.review:
关于这款游戏，喜欢的朋友可以关注一下我的游戏实测哦~还是值得推荐的哦

http://www.bilibili.com/video/av7176709/

下面让我来说说，地鼠4兄弟（Dig 4 Destruction），《D4D》是一款在限定时间内挖地寻找武器来打倒敌方的射击战斗游戏。玩家在360度的地图内挖地一定，在限定5分钟内，打倒最多敌人的玩家获胜。本作通过互联网可以和全世界玩家组成4人对战!在等待战斗的过程中还可以和房间的队友交流互动，乐趣十足。
游戏画面很精致，在vive强大性能下不会觉得很晕，人物外形设计的也非常有风格，可爱与凶恶交织。
操作的话主要是触控板负责前进后退，头显负责方向，扣动扳机拿起物品，再扣动射击，摇晃手柄丢掉武器。（感觉这个设计是个小亮点）
玩法的话不是普通的fps，除了射击元素外这个游戏是目前唯一的需要走位的射击类VR游戏，而且由于是360度立体循环的地图，让人摸不准敌人会从哪个角落窜出来，极大地丰富了游戏的趣味性！
道具包设计的非常丰富，有不同种类的枪支、火箭弹、甚至回血包，增强了游戏的可玩性。
地图也不是一成不变的，可以自行选择，有的地图甚至会出现传送门这样的设计，非常有趣！(￣3￣)

26487437.review:
这是一款结合了"躲"与"跑"的游戏，每局游戏时间限制为5分钟，四位玩家各自为战，换句话说，除了自己以外都是敌人。玩家们要做的就是挖出武器道具、发现敌人、与敌人战斗，同时还要小心避免自己成为别人的目标。
　　游戏限定的是时间，不限制死亡次数，所以限定时间内就算被击杀了也会立刻复活，最后根据击杀数量与被杀次数评分，当然击杀数量越高越好，被杀次数越低越好。
　　人与人之间的对战，就是智慧与智慧之间的碰撞，这也是该游戏最有意思的地方，讲究兵法策略的玩家也更容易取得胜利。
　　例如玩家可以采用"瓮中捉鳖"的方式，在视野比较好的地方放置诱饵，然后躲在角落给敌人一枪爆头;再例如"走为上计"，不断变换自己的方位，让敌人难以锁定自己;再有可以来一波"苦肉计"，假装投降求放过，然后背后偷袭等等，会玩的人可以把这个游戏玩得特别精彩。
　　《挖掘大作战》在画面上具有自己的特色，且细节制作非常细腻，音乐音效中规中矩，但若没有语音上的互动则有些无趣。多人在线的对战游戏使得其玩法有趣地出人意料，加之有VR的体感设计，让玩家思想与身体都无法脱离游戏，沉浸感与趣味性都极强。
　　Steam上售价仅仅40元，几乎是一般体验类或操作极少的小游戏价格，却能买到如此精致且有趣地游戏，可以说《挖掘大作战》性价比高的出人意料，喜欢此类游戏的玩家赶紧去下载吧。
原文地址：http://www.83830.com/game/201608/113648958_1.shtml
更多游戏评测：http://newgame.83830.com/

25102843.review:
Dig 4 Destruction is an awesome game that does not take itself seriously which is what makes it fun! I have been in contact with Colopl VR studio and have secured a copy to provide this review. 
After playing for a good amount of time, I have realized this will most likely become one of my go to VR games for solo play to socialize and have fun or to demo to friends and family since it is so simple to pick up and play.

When loading the game up, you are put into a lobby/room where you and 3 other players can socialize while waiting for the match to begin. This is a Death match type game. Think of the old days, NES, DIG DUG anyone? This is exactly that but brought into the modern VR era! 

Visuals: 

This game has a very colorful visual set which makes it enjoyable to play for longer play sessions. The blocks are well modeled, almost as if you are playing Minecraft here but with your hands. The player models look great, especially with the addition of the unlockables, the masks and weapons that you have access to while playing the game. The weapons look great and have a good variety.

Sound:

The sound has been perfected here as it is great when you fire your weapon, punch someone, dig through the ground or kill/get killed by someone. It is more on the cartoony side but it just works so well in here. It immerses you and all flows in harmony!

Level Design & Gameplay:

Once you start a match, all 4 players begin at opposite corners of the battlefield and are then faced with digging their way down in order to find a weapon and hopefully your first blood! The level is well laid out which creates a balance for everyone and once the game really gets going, chaos ensues! 
This game had me franticly move my arms in order to dig that made me look like a dog trying to swim, its great exercise and fun! I do enjoy the fact that it creates this feeling of action and anticipation during matches because if you are not quick enough to make your way to your enemies first or be quick on your feet to dig away in order to avoid fire, you will die. 
This game requires very little knowledge or prior skill to be able to successfully get points/kills as everyone here is at the same playing field. That is what I love about this game, how easy and fun it is to pick up. You are also provided a sonar scanner which does exactly what it sounds like, shoots out sonar for you to see where your enemy might be lurking close by as well as any powerups nearby.

Suggestions/General Feedback:

One of my issues that I wanted to be addressed was the ability to find out how much time is left in a match to adjust your play style accordingly, and before I could make this issue heard, the developers have added just that, a wrist watch to keep track of the match, simply awesome! 

Another gripe I have with this game is the lack of players at the time I played. Maybe it is due to the time or the player base, but the inclusion of enemy AI/Bots makes it playable and still worthwhile.
Another thing I noticed was at times when frantic fights were happening, enemies would sometimes lag out meaning I would see them skip more than a block at time which was an annoying bug for me. I am not sure whether this is client sided or server sided, but It has happened only a few times, not enough to interrupt the core gameplay.

I want to give praise for the style of the lobby and menu system. It is very well done and incorporated into the game. Your unlocks (Masks) can be changed real time via a wall rack which is always fun to try on and show off with your friends. You are also able to kill time by playing chess, Shoot fireworks and throw some basketballs to prove your worth!

Conclusion:

I strongly recommend this to everyone, not just because I would love to see this game succeed, but because I would love to see a much greater player base. The price is just right as it is something to compete with say a game called, Battle Dome, which yes, is different but provides similar levels of fun in short or long bursts. This game will have you laughing and franticly fight your way through your play space to get that first kill! There are not many negatives to say since everything works well as intended. Any bugs that are actually present, are being ironed out and should provide an even better experience going forward! A strong buy for any aged player looking to have some online, frantic, multiplayer fun!

25102193.review:
An incredible game with competitive potential, but limited by the lack of developer interaction. 

If this were an indie title, with the promise of growing into a game with more content and competitive matchmaking, it would be the Vive's killer app. 

But there's no reason to expect updates beyond the game's current state, or any reason to believe the developers would listen to any community that could grow from it. COLOPL is an interesting company with legitimately good VR games, but their releases have been treated as one-offs, likely sponsored for development by HTC, and others by Oculus. We’re looking at the finished product: it’s doubtful there’s a contract to develop the game further (but perhaps paid DLC should the game become popular?). This game is so close to filling the competitive multiplayer VR FPS void, but it ultimately falls short without official forums and the promise of more content. 

That said, D4D is an insanely fun deathmatch shooter that takes place in destructible arenas littered with guns. The main locomotion is done by short teleports in the direction of the headset, which means if you want to run from a fight, you have to lose sight of your opponent. I wish all competitive, arena style games (Battle Dome) forced teleporting in the direction of the headset like this. With a teleport mechanic that uses the direction of a controller, it's way easier to dodge, and player movement becomes less predictable, and much more random. But in D4D, you can’t teleport far, and you can’t strafe, so you’re forced to engage and fight when you finally find an enemy with your scanner, or turn and run. 

As a finished product, it’s totally worth the price. There are tons of unlocks, and the lobbies (if you can find one) are pure chaos. A game like this, with active developers, would be huge for the Vive.

25044648.review:
This is a fun game when I can find people online to play with. Alot of times when I try to find a match no one is online, but hopefully this will change as more people buy the game.

It has a unique movement system where you move forward in small increments while pressing the touchpad, which I prefer over VR games where you move forward continuously.

It's fun to dig around and find all the different weapons, theres lots of fun ones including a frying pan than deflects bullets. I also love how if you can get close to someone you can grab their weapon out of their hand and shoot them with it.

This game is lots of fun and is definitely worth it, especially since the price for it is so low compared to other VR games.

良い所
　ゲーム性は高いように思える。
　素手で殴り倒せたり、フライパンで攻撃を防げたり、相手の武器を奪えたり、相手の武器を撃ち落とせたりと自由度が高い。

悪い所
　Private Roomが立てられない。
　ゲーム終了後に同じメンバのまま再戦が出来ない。
　個人ロビーではメニュー選択にアイテムが必要なのだが個人ロビーに入った時の初期位置から少し移動しないとアイテムが取れない。
　移動するのに体力が必要。＞＜自分には、連続で何回もプレイできない。

24967124.review: 刚开始玩教学关时还在疑惑这个游戏居然是按方向键前进后退会不会晕，但经过一场真正的战役后完全打消了顾虑。太TMD好玩了。简单来说就是扫描，抢武器，挖洞，打死对手，周而复始直到时间结束后算排名。武器多种多样，让我想起了当年的百战天虫，有些杀伤力极强穿墙秒杀，还有跟踪弹绝对BUG般存在。可惜游戏刚出联机的人太少找不到房间，但可以预见到这款游戏必将是联机游戏大热门，近期VIVE游戏绝对精品！

24962560.review:
Dig for Destruction is going to be HUGE!

I think this is the only game that had me laughing and giggling while still playing the tutorial!

I can't wait for more people to be online so that I can get into some good multiplayer matches!

This game is great, the fast paced quirky style that it brings to the table keeps things feeling light and fun (even if you're getting destroyed) but and the same time giving you a reason to try.

Essentially you dig through the ground with your hands while you move forward. You use your sonar to scan for weapons and enemies. It's very straightforward and easy to pickup for anyone.  Even if you are the best player ever you will die plenty and even if you are the worst...well you will probably get kills because that damn rocket launcher is so op if you get to it's spawn.

In all seriousness this game will be a very fun game to pick up and play a few games at a time and then put down and come back later. There is loads of replayability in this game.

The game feels like it could be a lot like rec room in regards to the social environment. The waiting area puts all the players qued up for the match in the same room where you can play chess, light fireworks, break ceiling fans (oops I mean shoot basketball), look in the mirror at yourself, and loads more.
There is in game voice chat so that you don't have to rely on gestures. I feel that in a game like this both social and competitive voice chat is something that is greatly needed. Without it you can't hear the person laughing on the other end which in turn makes you laugh and then everyones laughing at something that had there been no voice chat wouldn't have even been that great.

As you complete achievements you unlock new masks to put on your head, esentially it's your in game avatar.

When you jump into a game you spawn in seperate corners and you start digging towards weapons. You can take your opponnents weapons from them if you're close enough as well! The whole game is so energetic and funny that it just works! There are several different weapons to use and try out, my personal favorite being the frying pan!

I can't wait for more updates and players online!

In case you want to see the game in action linked below is my gameplay commentary of Dig 4 Destruction. Enjoy!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=745797705

24955136.review:
Welcome to Dig 4 Destruction!
This is the competitive FPS where you giggle like a school girl the whole match.

I like the concept of digging into the ground to find weapons and power ups.
The lobby is well made and the whole feel of the game is good.

There is a limitation on maps, but since you will end up by digging most of it away, it doesn't really matter.

The tradeoffs in 1on1 really depends on range and weapon, but most of the time you will be fighting in close range but nothing beats the feel of getting close to your enemy armed with a grenade and a stealth potion and gently placing the grenade next to your victim, pull back a little and see the sucker blow up :D

Or just surprise your enemy with a frying pan and beat the shit out of him.
My mom would be so proud.

What is already there:
-Fun gameplay.
-Good animations and graphics.
-Good amount of weapons to choose from.
-POWER UPS!

What i hope to see:
-More power ups
-Map editor (would be a good game for that)
-Team deathmatch and/or other game modes
-more players = more to play with

24949628.review:
Super fun game!
I bought this game twice for my account and the one at the office, so we could have a mini multiplayer by ourselves (we haven't tried any multiplayer games yet, so we were curious).

...and oh, boy! the price is totally worth this little game. We had such intense fun, I wish I could show you my colleagues b**ch-slapping each other and stealing their guns from each other!
I'll keep playing it to unlock some more masks, but the main fun is the fast paced multiplayer with guns.
For the edevelopers, as constructive criticism, I agree this game should have a sideways movement... And also, maybe the way you drop the gun should be a bit different, for example dropping the gun over your shoulder, instead of the current fast shake? (I have dropped my gun accidentally a few times).

But again, I really recommend it, so buy it, the more we are the better!

穴掘りながら前方に逃げつつ、後方に銃を向けて適当に発砲しつつ牽制。
遮蔽物を盾にしつつ銃だけを突き出してブラインドファイア。
それが感覚的に実行出来るのだからVRはたまらないぜ。

と、いうわけでVRシューティングならではの要素が詰まった４人対戦ゲームです。

ロビーで戯れるのもなかなかに楽しいです。

24932548.review:
I first was like -meh-

The motion system is weird, there are not a lot of environnements, only one game mode, ... I tried the tutorial and already thought about a refund.
But then I started a multiplayer game, and I had one of the funniest time with my Vive to this date. I literally laughed my ass off at some times. 

The game is straight forward, totally no-brainer.
You scan the area to locate players and weapons, then dig your way to them by moving and punching cubes.
You die a lot and frag a lot.

PROs :
- Easy to play, games are fast paced, it's instant fun.
- Lots of (funny) weapons, 
- Environnements are fully destructible. They are just filled cubes made of smaller cubes, and you shape your playground with fists, bullets and explosions. 
- lots of masks to unlock (I don't know how yet, though).


CONs:
- There doesn't seem to need a lot of strategy nor skill... But that means that anyone can have fun, no Munchkin nor powergaming.
- The motion system is weird (you move "step by step" forward or backward with no transition), but at least it prevents from motion sickness. I don't understand why you're not allowed to move laterally, though. 
- Everything is destructible, even covers, so roomscale covering and ducking do not seem to be that useful (you die too fast anyway).
- The immersion is not the best I've seen (everything goes fast and moves are jerky, dodging and ducking seems useless -see above-, that does not helps make you really feel like "you are there") but the fun and clarity are there. 


Some moments to help you better understand why I recommend this game:

- Stealing the weapon from the hand of your enemy while he is using it, and frantically punching him in the face while he desperately tries to steal it back (seriously, this should be a norm in all shooters this is hilarious). 
- Dodging bullets with a frying pan, and repeatedly knocking your adversary on the top of the head with it... And winning... 
- Throwing a grenade right in front of an enemy who hasn't noticed you, observing him watching it, freaking out, trying to flee then exploding. One Tex-Avery moment. 
- Targeting an enemy with a scan through the wall with a rocket launcher, that digs a tunnel right to the target who never saw it coming.

24932100.review:
マインクラフトとボンバーマンを合わせたような対戦FPS。
オンラインで４人まで対戦可能。

対戦ステージは巨大な立方体で、各プレイヤーはそれぞれ離れた場所からスタートする。
立方体の下の方は、洞窟のような空洞がある。
クロールのように両手を回すと地面を掘り進めることが出来る。
地面はマイクラのようにブロックになっていて破壊可能。
プレイヤーは浮遊していて、足場がなくても自由に移動できる。

地面の中に武器がたくさん埋まっていて、それらを使って敵プレイヤーを倒す。
やられたらすぐ復活してタイムアップまで続ける。
ブロックからアイテムを探すのはボンバーマンっぽい。
武器の残弾は少なめで、撃ちつくしたらすぐ次の武器を探す。
武器はたくさん埋まっている。

壁を透視してアイテムの場所・敵の位置を確認するソナー機能を、
何回でも使うことが出来る。

オンラインのマッチング中は、待機ロビーでコミュニケーションが出来る。
ボイスチャットに対応しているがジェスチャーのみでも全然OK。

キャラクターは動物の被り物＋両手が表示される。
ロビーにはバスケットボール＋ゴールや、チェス、風船、カメラなど、
色々な物が置いてあり、キャッチボールをしたり記念写真をとったりして楽しめる。
実際、対戦よりもロビーでわいわいコミュニケーションをしている方が楽しい。

24931623.review: Great game, needs more content but the base is pretty solid and it's very polished, highly recommended.

24927122.review:

24926879.review:
太好玩了，价格也低，超值！作为VR联机游戏，现阶段最怕的就是不够人，这个游戏等待开始的大厅里有很多道具，终于不再是无聊的等待。一开始要完成教程才能正式进入游戏，教程跟实际的游戏比较来有点枯燥，完成后才发现实际的游戏真是充满乐趣，武器也比教程更多，强烈推荐！

8月17日补充：

玩了几天，说下经验，不然刚开始玩你可能会一脸懵逼。当然，自己慢慢玩慢慢摸索出来最有趣最有成就感。

↓
↓
↓
↓
↓

1.每天登录游戏会有新面具，不止是动物面具，目前我看到的有忍者、面包、骷髅等。

2.等待开始的大厅右侧黑墙，穿墙过去能看到一个练靶场，但是你很快就会被弹回来，到了一定级别才能一直显示，有枪练习打靶。

3.赤手空拳也可以打死对方。

4.武器在别人手里是可以抢过来的。

5.两只手都拿武器也可以挖掘移动，但移动没一手挖掘一手持武器方便。

6.地面上的天空有一个气球挂着炸弹飘来飘去，射气球炸弹会掉下去炸掉，射掉后很快会出现新的，很多人会忽略掉这个，怎么死的都不知道。

7.黑锅不是用来背的，可以用来拍死对方，还可以用来挡子弹。因为这个开挂一样的挡子弹，所以黑锅要一直按着手柄的扳机才能拿住。

8.杀伤力最大的火箭弹，虽然命中率最高，放出去了就能击中目标，但如果及时发现，可以逃脱，因为它是跟着你追的，所以可以把它引到敌人那炸掉；来不及逃脱的话可以隔一段距离用武器打掉就会引爆。

9.最后，小心手柄撞墙。没有2x2米的空间其实也可以玩，可以站着不动，但由于玩起来太投入，你经常会跟着走动，所以一不小心就会撞墙。
